name: TachiaiSumoNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Sumo news from the team at Tachiai, now in your Flash Briefing. We bring you the latest from the world of sumo: covering events from every Grand Sumo tournament, the Jungyo tours, and daily practice sessions. Match scores, daily previews, the latest injury reports, your one-stop source for any sumo fan.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
